message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. I value it highly, but I'm open to discussing a price that benefits both of us.  To start, I propose a price of $1,500,000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $1,200,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I see the value you place on the product, my initial offer reflects its true worth to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,350,000?
I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for considering my perspective. I would like to propose a price of $1,300,000. This feels like a fair compromise between our positions.
